snippet.title: FoxPaww Trailer | PC Windows & Linux | Available on Steam and Itch.io
snippet.description:
You're a fox in this cute, funny, nature-themed brick-breaker game with a twist!

Explore, discover and rescue its animal friends in 21 colorful, non-linear levels with an auto-map. Bounce or rotate your ball. Destroy or avoid cute obstacles. Levels are uniquely generated and highly replayable. Awoo!

Available for PC Windows & Linux on Itch.io and Steam
